maqras.text: 20|1|tta ha
20|2|hananim-i geudaeege kkulan-eul gyesiham-eun geugeos-eulo hayeo geudaeleul go saengdoege halyeoham-i anila
20|3|hananim-eul dulyeowohaneun ideul-eul wihan gyohun-i doege haessnola
20|4|geugeos-eun daejiwa nop-eun haneul-eul changjohan geubun-eulo buteo gyesidoen geos ila
20|5|hananim-eun gwonjwa-e anj-a gyesineunbun-ila
20|6|cheonjie issneun geosgwa geu saie issneun geosgwa daejimit-e issneun modeun geos-i geubunkke soghanola
20|7|geudaega keun solilo malhadeon tto neun geuleohji anihadeon sillo geubunkke seoneun bimildo geuligo gamchueojin geos do asinola
20|8|hananim oeeneun sin-i eobs-eumyeo geubun-eun gajang aleumdaun ileumdeul-eul gajigo gyesinila
20|9|mose-ui yaegiga geudaeege ileu leossneunyo
20|10|bola geuga bul-eul bogoseo geuuigajog-ege malhagil gidalila naega bul-eul bunmyeonghi boass-euni bul-eul gajyeo wa geugeos-eulo geu gil-e ileuneun annae jaleul balgyeonhalila
20|11|geuga geogie gass-eul ttae moseyahaneun soliga deullideoni
20|12|sillo naega neoui junim-igeoneul neoui sinbal-eul beos-eula neoneun seong-yeog-in ttuwa gyegog-e wa issnola
20|13|naega neoleul seontaeghayeoss-euni gye sidoeneun geos-e gyeongcheonghala
20|14|sillo naega hananim-iyo na oeeneun sin-i eobsnani naman-eul gyeongbaeha go yebaehamyeo naman-eul saeng-gaghala
20|15|sillo jongmal-i dagaogo iss-eu na naega geugeos-eul sumgilyeo ham-eun modeun salam-i geuga nolyeoghan daelo bosang-eul baddolog ham-ila
20|16|geugeos-eul midji anihago geuui yogmang-eul ttaleuneun jadeullo hayeogeum neo leul jeonhwanhaji anihadolog halini ineun nega myeolmangchi anihadolog ham ila
20|17|moseyeo ne oleunson-e issneun geugeos-i mueos-inyo
20|18|geuga daedabhagil geugeos-eun je jikkong-iibnida jega geugeos-e gidaego geugeos-eulo namu ipdeul-eul ttaelyeoseo yang eul meog-imyeo geu an-eseo daleun yuyongham eul chajnaida lago hani
20|19|geubunkkeseo moseya geugeos-eul deon jyeola hasimae
20|20|geuga geugeos-eul deonjini han mali ui baem-idoeeo jaeppalli gieogadeola
20|21|ittae geubunkkeseo moseya geugeos eul jwieola geuligo dulyeowohaji mal la naega geugeos-eul dasi wonsangtaelo halila
20|22|geudaeui son-eul neoui gyeodeulang-i e neoh-eula amuleon sonsang-i eobs-i ha yahge naolini ineun tto daleun yejeung ila
20|23|ileohge hayeo hananim-i neoe ge gajang widaehan hananim-ui yejeung-eul boilyeo ham-ila
20|24|palao-ege ga boala geuneun sillo modeun hangyeleul neom-eoseon omanhan jala
20|25|ittae mosega juyeo jeoleul wihaejeoui ma-eum-eul hwaljjag yeol-eojusoseo
20|26|geuligo jeoui il-i swibdolog hayeo jusoseo
20|27|jeoui hyeoe jang-aemul-eul jegeoha yeo jujoseo
20|28|geulihayeo geudeul-i jeoui mal-eul ihaehadolog hayeo jusoseo
20|29|jeoui gajogjung-ui han salam-i jeoui bowanjaga doedolog hayeo juso seo
20|30|alon-eun jeoui hyeongjeini
20|31|geulo hayeogeum jeoleul ganghage hago
20|32|geuga jeoui il-e hamkke hayeo jusoseo
20|33|ineun jeohuiga dangsin-eul keuge chanmihago
20|34|jeohuiga dangsin-eul keuge yeom-wonha goja haobnida
20|35|sillo dangsin-eun jeohuideul-eul bogo gyesinaida
20|36|ie geubun-ui malsseum-i iss-eoss-eu ni moseya neoui yoguga ilueojyeoss nola
20|37|hananim-eun daleun ttaeedo neoe ge eunheleul bepul-eossnola
20|38|bola neoui eomeonikke yeong-gam-eu loseo gyesileul bonaessnola

20|39|geuligo geu aeleul sangja-e neoh-eonailgang-e deonjyeola geu gang-i geuaeleul gang eondeog-eulo eullil geos-ini naui jeog-imyeo tto geuui jeog-in jaga geuaeleul deligo galila geuleona naneun neoe ge naui salang-eul bepul-eoss-euni ineun nega naui an-eseo yang-yugdoedolog haess nola

20|40|bola neoui nu-iga wa jega i aeleul yang-yughal han salam-eul annaehayeo deulilkkayo malhadeola geulihayeo hananim-i neoleul neoui eomeonikkelo bonaeni geunyeoui nun-eun pyeong-an-eul chajgo seulpeohaji anhdeola nega geuttaee han salam-eul salhaehayeoss-euna hananim-eun neoleul keun jaeang-eulobuteo guhago neo leul siheom-eulo buteo guhayeossnola mi dian salamdeul saieseo sunyeon dong-an meomuldaga myeonglyeong-e ttala mose nega yeogie wassnola
20|41|naega neoleul seontaeghaess-euni ineun naleul wiham-ila
20|42|neowa ne hyeongjega naui jingpyoleulgajigo gala geuligo na-e daehan yeom-won-eul geeulli haji malla
20|43|neohui dul-eun palao-ege gala geuneun sillo hangyeleul neom-eoseon omanhan jala
20|44|geuleona geuege chinjeolhage malhala amado geuneun gyeong-gagsim-eul gajgeo na hananim-eul dulyeowo hal sudo issneunila
20|45|geu dul-i malhagil juyeo jeohui neun sillo geuga seodulleo jeohuileul haechiji anh-eulkka ttoneun poaghan jis-eul hajianh-eulkka dulyeobnaida
20|46|ie geubunkkeseo dulyeowo haji malla naega neohuiwa hamkke iss-eumyeo deudgo geuligo bogo issnola

20|47|geuleoni neohui dul-eun geuege gaseo ulineun junim-i bonaen seonjijala geuleoni uliwa hamkke iseula-el ja sondeul-eul bonaedoe geudeul-eul goelobhiji malla ulineun junim-eulo buteo jingpyo leul gajyeo wassnola bog-eum-eul ttaleuneun ja-ege pyeonghwaga iss-eul geos-ila
20|48|bulsinhago deung-eul dollineun ja-e geneun jaeang-i iss-eul geos-ilaneun gyesi ga iss-eossnola
20|49|ittae geuga moseya neohuiui junim-eun nugu-inyo lago mul-euni
20|50|mosega uliui junim-eun modeun manmul-eul changjohasigo gaggag-ege gineung-eul jusin bun-isila
20|51|ittae palaoga geuleom i jeon sedaedeul-ui unmyeong-eun eotteo haessneunyo
20|52|geuga malhagil geue daehan jisig eun naui junimkke issnola naui junim-eun silsu hasigeona ij-ji ani hasinola

20|53|geubunkkeseoneun dangsindeul-eul wihae daejileul yolam-eulo hayeoss-eumyeo geu an e gil-eul jusieossnola ttohan hananim eun haneullobuteo bileul naelige hayeo geugeos-eulo hayeo yeoleogaji chomog-eul ssagteuge hayeossnola
20|54|geugeos-eul il-yonghan yangsig-eulo seob chwihago geuligo neohuideul-ui gachug-eul gilleola sillo jihyega issneun jaleul wihan yejung-i geu an-e issnola
